review: I consulted Dr. Anviti for my lower wisdom tooth issue. The clinic is very nice and the ambience is excellent. She immediately diagnosed me for Pericoronitis which was in a severe condition and she recommended me to Dr. Tejas Mhatre for the wisdoom tooth extraction. He is very young and seemed with not much with great experience but he proved me wrong. Generally, Every one wishes to go to a doctor with a grey hair for the sake of experience. I am very scared of Hospital treatments and was much more during extraction but Dr. Tejas Mhatre made me feel very relaxed and comfortable. He guided me about the process before very nicely. During the course of extraction, He asked if I was comfortable or not at regular intervals making me feel more confident. He gave an estimate of 30 mins but just when I thought the process has begun, he shocked me by saying " Gaurav its done !! " I was spellbounded with his expertise, high efficiency & Skill. He took mere unbelievably mere 9 minutes to do the extraction. He took utmost care of Hygiene & my comfort. Dr Tejas has a very pleasing personality, is extremely talented. My whole experience was completely painless. Later, I was having discomfort with the edge of the bone near the extracted area. Dr. Anviti grinded that portion and treated me well. She didnt charge anything extra for that :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks to dr Anviti & dr Nishita.....My treatment is going on for RCT and was afraid for pain initially but dr is vry frndly and do the treatment vry easily according to our paitience,capacity.....i dint even suffer from pain while doing the treatment & got explained vry nicely abt infection and wat treatment done exactly by the dr.....also they always available during our critical time or ny emergency or any question.....I liked that clinic is open with taking all precautions during this pandemic situation also hence no paitient will suffer for long time.....I will highly recommend everyone to go for any problem related to teeth with no any doubt and do always smile :)
reply_text: Thank you for the positive feedback. We look forward to serve you similarly for all your dental needs in future :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.Anviti 1st time around 6-8 months back for a toothache & she took X Ray n suggested RCT. I was super scared of extraction or RCT coz of my earlier experience with another doc.. hence requested her a lot to just fill n avoid RCT, upon repeated request she filled n also told me “you are wasting money”..I didn’t listen to her then but her advice turned out right. Now it was time of extraction & RCT.. I didn’t expect the extraction of my wisdom teeth was done in just 15 mins n hardly any pain. I STRONGLY RECOMMEND DR ANVITI. Staff is friendly as her always smiling n ensuring the patient is comfortable always.

My first impression as soon as I entered the clinic was very nice , beautiful ganpati bappa sitting in the reception area. Soothing and calm ambience of the clinic. I was very impressed by the interiors with cars and being a teacher I really liked the way Dr explained it to me by drawing on the board how my treatment is going to be. 
She treated me very well and all my best wishes to Dr. Anviti and her staff. Thank you very much for a great experience. She has now become my family dentist as my wife ,daughter,granddaughters are also taking treatment with her and are also very happy!

Dr. Anviti is very meticulous in her work and is an expert in her field who goes the extra mile to ensure that her patient is at ease during the procedure. She is well versed in her subject and explains the complicated dentistry aspects in a simple and lucid manner so that even a layman can understand the details of thr procedure they are likely to undergo. She ensured that the back tooth which had chipped off was filled appropriately and took extra care to ensure that the tooth is isolated from liquids so that the filling lasts longer and does not give away soon.

On my First visit met Dr.Anviti , whose meticulous nature of explaining things in a calm unperturbed manner helped me make my decision to finalise my dental surgery with no other than her clinic.I needed 4 tooth extractions which I was not at all looking forward to.However The clinic had Tejas Mhatre as the visiting doctor who did my surgery.His friendly nature eased me up during the procedure and he explained me calmly that it won't hurt.That gave me a lot of confidence.I was done with the entire procedure very quickly and I barely felt anything.The entire process was done very neatly.I highly recommend the clinic and doctors since not every dental clinics are able to do a good work.Cost wise they are very economical too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor, unlike others explained my situation showed me visuals of how my tooth structure is and told me about the problem. Then explained the process of solution so that I am aware about what is happening. And with a gentle hand got the surgery done. Highly recommended!

Clinic follows strict safety protocols. Managing appointments and timeliness scores high. Doctor is skilled and experienced and to the point explaining the issues and very good with the treatment.
Payment options are flexible with almost all digital options available. Overall great experience.

context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: My front tooth had decayed pretty badly, we had to opt for root canal, as its the front tooth it was really essential for the cap to match the rest of the teeth, which it eventually did.  Now, cannot even tell that it is a cap. Blends in really well. Did a lot of other fillings and cleaning too. They were really friendly, and understanding of the pandemic situation by taking the necessary preventive measures. Honestly, worth the time and money :)
reply_text: Thank you for the positive feedback. Looking forward to serve you and your family for all your dental needs in future !

review:
Visited her for tooth pain.
My molar tooth was giving me immense pain and I had visited some other dentist before her they told me to get the tooth removed which I was not willing to, so then I visited her she checked and explained me the problem and the treatment.
After the treatment the pain has gone completely. And I did not remove any tooth.
Genuine treatment ,properly explained .
Very happy with the treatment! 
Thank you Dr.Anviti

The doctor was very helpful all along the treatment. I used to get real time answers to all my queries. I have been going to her for more than a year and a half now, and I am very happy with the treatment. She even has a team of other specialists on her panel, who come over once in a while to improve the treatment quality. I am not yet through the complete treatment, but I will recommend her to others for sure.

I visited for badly decayed front teeth ..they were looking really bad/black for that I visited Dr. Anviti. She explained why it has happened and how is she going to treat it. I got rid of those black teeth by doing composite fillings by her. Very happy with my new smile. Thanks to Dr. Anviti

Visited for placing a cap on my tooth. Was scared to visit a dentist  but after visiting here it was a different experience. Doctor was very polite and explained me different types of caps and advantages and disadvantage of each of them which made me very clear which cap I wanted to go for. Treatment went as she explained and very smoothly. The ambience is very nice with cars and music of my choice. Clinic is very clean and systematic. 10/10 for the experience. Thank you Dr Anviti

I would surely recommend Dr. Anviti I visited her for an extraction. This was my second extraction but was surely painless. She talks through the entire procedure makes sure that you are fine and with sweet interactions gets thing done. Very professional equipped with the latest technology and a patient friendly clinic.

My experience with Dr. Anviti has always been fantastic. She gives an appointment and adheres to the time. She knows her job perfectly well and gives the right treatment. I have had my teeth in perfect order and she ensures that I face no problem whatsoever in this regard.

My second root canal at Dr. Anviti's Dental Cube. The last one, left molar, was six months back. A smooth procedure of the first one and no after effects am able to use the left molar as am in teens (am a non-vegetarian). The procedure on the right molar now was also smooth, in fact better than last time.
I am not at all happy with the way i am forced to pay as consultation fees without prior confirmation.  * **** *****  *** ** ** ****** ****** *** * ***** *******
reply_text: With all due respect sir you yourself walked in for a dental consultation we never forced you to come and you assumed that getting a checkup from doctor in a clinic is going to be free. I am very sorry if you thought things in life come for free but the same amount is charged for everyone and you were not overcharged. We look forward to take care of your teeth in case you need any dental care in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good experience. She is very Professional and also friendly. I felt very comfortable. She explain everything clearly. I'd recommend her to everyone I know. Thank you!!

Very happy with my new smile. My front tooth had chipped off and was looking really bad so i went to dr anviti for some solution to it. She not only fixed my chipped tooth also she corrected my other teeth which were giving a bad look to my smile. She explained it to me why my tooth chipped off and how we are going to correct it also she explained it to me via videos how my other tooth also had few cavities. I immediately got it corrected and the expeirence was great. I am very happy with the consulation and the whole treatment is because it was all so systematic. For a person like me who is not aware of whats going on with my teeth and totally scared to visit a dentist, she has removed all my fear and since my smile has turned out to be better i am even happier.
I would definately recomment her to all my friends,family and collegues. Thanks doc ! 
And also thanks to the staff for co-operating with my late appoinments.

This is my second visit to dr anviti..got my root canal done for one of my tooth before and now came in for another. The way she does root canal is really appreciable. In no point of time she says its done. I was scared of dentist before but dr anviti was so smooth during the first root canal that I was very happy to come for the second one. The ambience of the clinic is very nice with cars and different tv shows posters and smooth music which makes you feel more comfortable and relaxed. I would recommend to visit her for all the dental problems. She is just too good...thank you dr anviti for giving me a painless treatment experience.
